templates:
Dear {manager_name},

I'm feeling under the weather with {symptom}. Due to my condition, I will not be able to come to work today.

I expect to return to work on {return_date}.

Best regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

I regret to inform you that I am suffering from {symptom} and need to take a sick leave today. I have consulted a doctor and been advised to rest.

I will resume work on {return_date}. I have informed my team about any urgent tasks.

Regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

Due to {symptom}, I will not be able to come to office today. I have already updated my team regarding pending work.

I should be back by {return_date}.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

I would like to request vacation leave from {start_date} to {end_date} for {reason}.

I will ensure all pending tasks are completed before my leave and will delegate any ongoing responsibilities. I will return to office on {return_date}.

Best regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

I am writing to request annual leave from {start_date} to {end_date}. The purpose of my leave is {reason}.

I have prepared a handover document and briefed my team about ongoing projects. I will resume work on {return_date}.

Thank you for your consideration.

Regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

I am writing to formally resign from my position, effective {last_working_date}. As per my contract, I am providing {notice_period} notice.

{reason}

I will ensure a smooth handover of all my responsibilities and documentation during my notice period.

Thank you for the opportunities for growth and development during my time here.

Best regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

With this letter, I would like to announce my resignation effective {last_working_date}. I am providing {notice_period} notice as required.

{reason}

I am committed to ensuring a seamless transition of my duties before my departure.

I appreciate all the support and opportunities I have received.

Sincerely,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

I am writing to request permission to work from home on {date} due to {reason}.

I will be available on my phone and email during regular working hours and will attend all scheduled meetings virtually.

Best regards,
{sender_name}

Dear {manager_name},

I would like to work remotely on {date} as {reason}.

I will ensure all my deliverables are met and maintain regular communication with the team. I will be fully available during business hours.

Thank you for your consideration.

Regards,
{sender_name}
